title: A financial OS for the 99% - now!
description: How can we fast track the delivery of the first benefits of a global financial OS to the average citizen of the world in the next 6 months?
importance: Understanding of advanced Gen 3 blockchain technology is still a privilege of the relative few who are able to understand and benefit
success: Faster expansion, lower barriers for using Cardano, trust, removal of hurdles blocking average citizens from using Cardano
